    • buildResponseFilter

      @Deprecated default void buildResponseFilter(OperationContext operationContext, Collection<String> includePrefixes, JsonSchemaDefinition rootSchema, ResponseFilterBuilder.FilterMode mode, RestResource resource)
      Deprecated.
      use buildResponseFilter(OperationContext, Collection, JsonSchemaDefinition, FilterMode, RestResource, boolean, boolean)

    • buildResponseFilter

      void buildResponseFilter(OperationContext operationContext, Collection<String> includePrefixes, JsonSchemaDefinition rootSchema, ResponseFilterBuilder.FilterMode mode, RestResource resource, boolean validateFieldsParameters, boolean includeAdditionalAccessibleFields)
      This method builds the response filter for the resource
      Parameters:
      operationContext - the operation context
      includePrefixes - all the prefixes
      rootSchema - the JSON Schema definition
      mode - the filter mode
      resource - the current resource
      validateFieldsParameters - If true and the URL contains "fields" parameter then the request would fail with permission error if the user doesn't have permission to view the field specified in the "fields" parameter on a resource.
      includeAdditionalAccessibleFields - if true, intersect additional accessible field filters with the fields from role file

    • containsNonMetaFields

      boolean containsNonMetaFields()
